column5: Yikes - what a way to start your day Bear Grabs man off outhouse seat
HOLY CRAP!!! :rofl2:  He's damn lucky he had someone else there with him and that they had a gun.
I think all he wanted was the Sharman Skeeter , you see them after it all the time on tv
Wow....  I thought bathroom time was rough after taco bell...
I guess bears like to hang around 'dumps'.
